# `{{ $frontmatter.title }}` for [math](/commands/categories/math.md)

<div class='command-title'>{{ $frontmatter.math }}</div>

## Signature

```> math sqrt {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input        | output      |
| ------------ | ----------- |
| list\<number\> | list\<float\> |
| number       | float       |
## Examples

Compute the square root of each number in a list
```nu
> [9 16] | math sqrt
╭───┬──────╮
│ 0 │ 3.00 │
│ 1 │ 4.00 │
╰───┴──────╯

```
